entry.title: 4 Pack | 12 LED Warm White Waterproof Solar Disk Pathway Garden Lights
entry.summary:
Vendor: eFavormart
Type: LED
Price: 14.69

[About]

Quantity: 4 Solar Disk Pathway Lights
Material: Metal, Plastic
LED Color: Warm White
Style: Solar Powered LED Disks
Total LEDs per Disk: 12
Individual Disk Size: 4.5" Diameter x 0.5" Thick
Assembly Required: Yes (Instructions included)
Total Size (Assembled): 5" Height x 4.5" Diameter
Individual Stake Size (Assembled): 4.75" Height x 3" Width
Battery Capacity: Built-in 1xAAA Ni MH 600mAh rechargeable battery
Needs 8 hours to be fully charged and can last for 6-8 hours.
Features: Integrated Light Sensor, Waterproof design, Easy-to-install and Long Working Time
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]


Additional Information:

  • Please make sure to TURN ON the switch before use.
  • Integrated Light Sensor: The highly effective light sensor will turn on the fixture automatically at night and turn off at day.
  • Each Disk is individually encased in bubble wrap with a 2x-Part Stake
  • Easy-to-install: The Stake has 2x pieces each with a slotted cut to slide into one another. It forms 4x bumps that fit into each circle indentation located below each Disk
  • Applications: Because of the decorative nature of these Solar Pathway Lights, they can be affixed on driveways, sidewalks, lawns parameters or placed on entrance stairs.
  • Battery and LEDs are not replaceable
  • As it is Solar Powered, it does not require any additional battery
  • It can be used Indoor and Outdoor

[Information]

 

Gorgeous Marquee Lights

Give your festive spirit and celebratory mood a language to spread cheer and sparkle all around with our gorgeous gold mirror front 3D marquee Letters, Numbers, and Symbols. Spell out your heart feeling, give words to your emotions, and highlight the glorious benchmarks with these lovely signs and symbols. Featuring sturdy and neat white plastic frame and glistening gold mirror face with warm LED lights that sparkle in any setting; our lightweight Marquee Signs will give your space a warm and welcoming atmosphere.

Versatile Light Up Letters

Add festive illuminated touch to any décor and space with this versatile lighting accent that can be employed in DIY crafts projects, child’s room décor, wedding ceremony or reception, and any other event all year round! Each sign is individually battery operated by 2AAA batteries and is cordless, thus allowing you to arrange them however you choose.

Stand or Hang it!

Either make these Marquee Lights stand on their own to ooze welcoming sheen all around or hang from walls, pillars, arches, columns, and backdrops to create one of a kind illuminated party setup!
